bug.author: LaurentBerger
bug.description: cvtColorTwoPlane What is it for? <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/trunk/d7/d1b/group__imgproc__misc.html#ga8e873314e72a1a6c0252375538fbf753>doc </denchmark-link> describes nothing

comments.comment: It is for conversion from NV12 with two separate planes (Y and UV) to BGR. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/10081>#10081</denchmark-link> for details.
